titles.title: To authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs at Denver, Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
3/5/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project for a replacement facility for the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Denver, Colorado.
